messages: We're LIVE on both YouTube & Twitch!
We're testing some new widget features. Please be aware of any weird bugs and the curse words that follow.
DISCLAIMER: 95% of anything Moose ever says is a symptom of his irony disorder and he should not be taken seriously under any circumstances.

Welcome to our Silent Hill f deep dive analysis streams! We'll be using our knowledge of Silent Hill, Shinto, Higurashi, Umineko and Ryukishi07's background to truly be able to dig into this motherfucker.
